long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your new tab your own!

With this widget based new tab extension you can finally customize 
your new tab to make it perfectly fit your needs.

Pick whichever widgets you like, manage your todo's, have an analogue clock or
set a timer to not miss the start of your next online call. 

Drag & Drop all widgets to the perfect spot and resize them to build your own layout.

This new tab also comes with an image galerie in which you may use any image you can 
find on the internet to create changing background images every time you access the page.

--- Features ---
- fully customizable layout
- customizable background galeries
- timer, todo, clock and more

--- Permissions ---
In order for this extension to function the following permissions are required:
- storage: required to save your layout, settings and galerie so you don't have to redo everything after restarting the browser
- topSites: required to give you quick access to your most used websites

--- Optional permissions ---
- notifications: will be requested when you add the timer widget to the page. This is needed to notify you when the timer has run out

We are constantly working on new widgets and general enhancements, if you have any suggestions or run into problems please feel free to leave a review
